main event: A civilian reported observing a white balloon-shaped object in Fallon, Nevada, on September 10, 1968.
interesting points: The object moved erratically with air currents and sudden jerks., The witness observed the phenomenon through binoculars and the unaided eye., The sighting lasted for approximately 20 to 30 minutes., The object was described as white and appeared circular with a dent on one side., Despite being identified as a probable balloon, evidence suggested that it was not a balloon.
witness description: retired dairy farmer with a high school education; reliability unknown
